Verses: 1 theevugaLE, enakku sevikodungaL; dhooraththilirukkiRa janangaLE, gavaniyungaL; thaayin karppaththilirundhadhumudhal karththar ennai azhaiththu, naan en thaayin vayitril irukkaiyil en naamaththaip praSthaabappaduththinaar.
2 avar en vaayaik koormaiyaana pattayamaakki, thamadhu karaththin nizhalinaal ennai maRaiththu, ennaith thulakkamaana ambaakki, ennaith thamadhu ambaRaaththooNiyilE moodivaiththaar.
3 avar ennai nOkki: nee endhaasan; iSravElE, naan unnil magimaippaduvEn endraarï¿½.
4 adhaRku naan: virudhaavaai uzhaikkiREn, veeNum viyarththamumaai en belanai selavazhikkiREn; aagilum en nyaayam karththaridaththilum, en belan en dhEvanidaththilum irukkiRadhu endru sonnEn.

5 yaakkObaith thammidaththil thiruppumpadi naan thaayin karppaththilirundhadhumudhal karththar thamakkuththaasanaaga ennai uruvaakkinaar; iSravElO sEraadhEpOgiRadhu; aagilum karththarudaiya paarvaiyil ganamadaivEn, en dhEvan en belanaayiruppaar.

6 yaakkObin kOththirangaLai ezhuppavum, iSravElil kaakkappattavargaLaith thiruppavum, neer enakku dhaasanaayiruppadhu aRpakaariyamaayirukkiRadhu; neer boomiyin kadaisipariyandhamum ennudaiya ratchippaayirukkumpadi, ummai jaadhigaLukku oLiyaagavum vaippEn engiRaar.

7 iSravElin meetparum adhin parisuththarumaagiya karththar, manusharaal asattaipaNNappattavarum, jaadhiyaaraal aruvarukkappattavarum, adhigaarigaLukku oozhiyakkaaranumaayirukkiRavarai nOkki, uNmaiyuLLa karththar nimiththamum, ummaith therindhukoNda iSravElin parisuththarnimiththamum, raajaakkaL kaNdu ezhundhirundhu, prabukkaL paNindhukoLvaargaL endru sollugiRaar.
8 pinnum karththar: anukkiraga kaalaththilE naan umakku sevikoduththu, ratchaNiyanaaLilE umakku udhaviseydhEn; neer boomiyai seerppaduththi, paazhaaikkidakkiRa idangaLai sudhandharikkappaNNavum;

9 kattuNdavargaLai nOkki: puRappattuppOngaL endrum; iruLil irukkiRavargaLai nOkki: veLippadungaL endrum sollavum, naan ummaik kaappaatri, ummai janangaLukku udanpadikkaiyaaga ERpaduththuvEn; avargaL vazhiyOrangaLilE mEyvaargaL; sagala mEdugaLilum avargaLukku mEychchal uNdaayirukkum.

10 avargaL pasiyaayiruppadhumillai, thaagamaayiruppadhumillai; ushNamaagilum, veyilaagilum avargaLmEl paduvadhumillai; avargaLukku irangugiRavar avargaLai nadaththi, avargaLai neerootrugaLidaththiRkuk koNdupOividuvaar.
11 en malaigaLaiyellaam vazhigaLaakkuvEn; en paadhaigaL uyarththappadum.
12 idhO, ivargaL dhooraththilirundhu varuvaargaL; idhO, avargaL vadakkilum mERkilumirundhu varuvaargaL, ivargaL seeneem dhEsaththilumirundhu varuvaargaL engiRaar.

13 vaanangaLE, gembeeriththuppaadungaL; boomiyE, kaLikooru; parvadhangaLE, gembeeramaai muzhangungaL; karththar thammudaiya janaththukku aaRudhal seydhaar; siRumaippattirukkiRa thammudaiyavargaL mEl irakkamaayiruppaar.
14 seeyOnO: karththar ennaik kaivittaar, aaNdavar ennai maRandhaar endru sollugiRaaL.
15 SthreeyaanavaL than karppaththin piLLaikku irangaamal, than paalaganai maRappaaLO? avargaL maRandhaalum, naan unnai maRappadhillai.
16 idhO, en uLLankaigaLil unnai varaindhirukkiREn; un madhilgaL eppOdhum enmun irukkiRadhu.
17 un kumaarar theeviriththu varuvaargaL; unnai nirmoolamaakkinavargaLum unnaip paazhaakkinavargaLum unnaivittup puRappattuppOvaargaL.

18 un kaNgaLai EReduththu sutrilum paar; avargaLellaarum Egamaaikkoodi unnidaththil varugiRaargaL; nee avargaLellaaraiyum aabaraNamaagath thariththu, maNamagaL aNindhukoLvadhupOla, nee avargaLai aNindhukoLvaai endru, en jeevanaikkoNdu sollugiREn endru karththar uraikkiRaar.
19 appozhudhu un vanaandharangaLum, un paazhidangaLum, nirmoolamaana un dhEsamum, inik kudigaLin thiraLinaalE unakku nerukkamaayirukkum; unnai vizhunginavargaL dhooramaavaargaL.
20 piLLaigaLatrirundha unakku uNdaayirukkappOgiRa piLLaigaL: idam engaLukku nerukkamaayirukkiRadhu; naangaL kudiyirukkumpadikku vilagiyiru endru, un kaadhugaL kEtka solluvaargaL.

21 appozhudhu nee: ivargaLai enakkup piRappiththavar yaar? naan piLLaigaLatrum, thaniththum siRaippattum, nilaiyatrum irundhEnE; ivargaLai enakku vaLarththavar yaar? idhO, naan ondriyaai vidappattirundhEnE; ivargaL engEyirundhavargaL? endru un irudhayaththil solluvaai.

22 idhO, jaadhigaLukku nEraaga en karaththai uyarththi, janangaLukku nEraaga en kodiyai EtruvEn; appozhudhu un kumaararaik kodungaigaLil EndhikkoNdu varuvaargaL; un kumaaraththigaL thOLinmEl eduththukkoNdu varappaduvaargaL endru karththaraagiya aaNdavar sollugiRaar.

23 raajaakkaL unnai vaLarkkum thandhaigaLum, avargaLudaiya naayagigaL un kaiththaaigaLumaayiruppaargaL; tharaiyilE mugankuppuRa vizhundhu unnaip paNindhu, un kaalgaLin thooLai nakkuvaargaL; naan karththar, enakkuk kaaththirukkiRavargaL vetkappaduvadhillai enbadhai appozhudhu aRindhukoLvaai;
24 paraakkiraman kaiyilirundhu koLLaipporuLaip paRikkakkoodumO? alladhu needhiyaai siRaippattuppOnavargaLai viduvikkakoodumO?

25 endraalum idhO, paraakkiramanaal siRaippaduththappattavargaLum viduvikkappaduvaargaL, belavandhanaal koLLaiyidappattadhum vidudhalaiyaakkappadum; unnOdu vazhakkaadugiRavargaLOdE naan vazhakkaadi, un piLLaigaLai ratchiththukkoLLuvEn;

26 unnai odukkinavargaLudaiya maamsaththai avargaLukkE thinnakkoduppEn; madhubaanaththaal veRikoLvadhupOl thangaLudaiya raththaththinaal veRikoLvaargaL; karththarum yaakkObin vallavarumaagiya naan un ratchagarum un meetparumaayirukkiRadhai maamsamaana yaavarum aRindhukoLvaargaLendru karththar sollugiRaar.
